name: An umbral veil < Prismatic >
data: It increases the users dexterity a good amount.
It has poor armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It allows the user to see in darkness.
It allows the user to see magical auras.
It allows the user to see invisible.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration somewhat.
It increases the users psionic resistance adequately.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'hiding'.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'dodge'.
It increases the users cold resistance adequately.
The thin tissue of shadow allows the wearer to safely look through
the prismatic lens, revealing previously unseen dimensions of the
